summary: A new world space with a lush forest and beautiful scenery with a player owned home. A large new area is on the way and I want your idea's for what it should be.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]
The Special edition Version is here!
And it is 100 times better![/size]



[size=6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/4426/?]The Valley of Peace - Special Edition[/url][/size]










ignore...
!!!![This is a Work in Progress]!!!!

The Pathway to Peace is located near Riverwood

I need people to test it and tell me what to add!

Leave any suggestions in the comments

The Valley of Peace includes:

Player owned house

Sawmill

Small Dungeon

Canyon

Beautiful scenery

7 NPC's with dialogue! (some things said may be inapropriate)

New Town

Blacksmith

Several New Merchants

Real Estate Shop

Vickie's Inn

Valley of Peace Estate

Tom and Riley's Tavern

Watch out for Jake the Master Wizard in the basement, yes he is wierd


The Valley of Peace may not be a peaceful as you think...

!!!!!!! READ BELOW !!!!!!!!

Please leave a comment about what I should add to the mod, I really will do whatever you comment, unless its something impossible, but other than that i will add whatever you guys comment.

What else needs to be added to the town? Leave a comment!

-----------------
Installation
-----------------
Extract all files into Skyrim/data/
if it says to replace anything press Yes to All
author: axxbradxxa

files.name: Valleyofpeace
files.changelogHtml:
Added Vorshan Mine
Added Colby's Armory
Added Valley of Peace Teleport Spell
Valley of Peace Crime Faction
2 More merchants to town center
